Package autohit.common

Interface Summary
AutohitErrorCodes Standard error codes
AutohitProperties Properties for configuration
 

Class Summary
AutohitBasicLogManager Basic autohit log manager.
AutohitLogDrain An abstract logging formatter for Autohit Tools.
AutohitLogDrainDefault An default subclass of AutohitLogDrain.
AutohitLogDrainRouting An routing subclass of AutohitLogDrain.
AutohitLogInjectorWrapper This is a helper for using channels for logging.
CommandLine Manage a command line.
Constants AUTOHIT wide constants
EasySSLProtocolSocketFactory EasySSLProtocolSocketFactory can be used to creats SSL Sockets that accept self-signed certificates.
EasyX509TrustManager EasyX509TrustManager unlike default X509TrustManager accepts self-signed certificates.
Formatter formatting helpers
NOPair Name value pair
NVPair Name value pair
ProcessMonitor Process monitors.
ThreadContext Context items for threads.
Utils A bunch of utils
 

Exception Summary
AutohitException A base exception for Autohit.
